author: ben_a_adams
content: What if we went with PeerDAS enabled and just picked 1 CL; would that make it easier to setup up?

author: _shemnon
content: Kurtosis has issues, the package is only set up to produce Pectra or Fulu, not a hybrid Electra/Osaka.  So any kurtosis network will need to decide if we want the PeerDAS or FOCIL protoypes alingside it, addin un-needed complexity.

author: _shemnon
content: Which single CL would be the most stable?  I'm unfamiliar with their current dev processes.
